headline: Ransom DDoS attacks target a Fortune Global 500 company
keywords: DDoS, Ransom Attacks, Fancy Bear, Magic Transit, Lazarus group, Speed & Reliability
description: In late 2020, a major Fortune Global 500 company was targeted by a Ransom DDoS (RDDoS) attack by a group claiming to be the Lazarus Group. Cloudflare quickly onboarded them to the Magic Transit service and protected them against the lingering threat.
